com.ucd.comp41690.team21.zenze.game

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ucd.comp41690.team21.zenze.game.GameObject

  • public class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    The Base class for every object in the world the behaviour of the different objects is defined by the components

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameObject

        public GameObject(InputComponent inputHandler,
                  PhysicsComponent physics,
                  Type type,
                  float x,
                  float y,
                  int scale,
                  java.lang.String tag)
        Creates a new Game Object
        Parameters:
        inputHandler - The AI or User issued Commands to controll this object
        physics - The component handling the physics and collisions of a object
        type - Defines the type of the object
        x - The position along the x axis
        y - The position along the y axis
        scale - The scale of this object. As the game is dealing with tiles, this can only be an int
        tag - An optional tag to easly identify the object

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(double elapsedTime)
        updates an object by processing input and handling physics
        Parameters:
        elapsedTime - the time gone since the last update

        public java.lang.String getTag()
